example[0]: He proposed a second meeting as a sign of his good faith.
example[1]: The woman who sold me the car claimed she had acted in good faith (=had not meant to deceive me).
definition[1]: when a person, country etc intends to be honest and sincere and does not intend to deceive anyone
example[2]: A ceasefire was declared as a sign of good faith.
example[3]: The company had acted in good faith.
